explanation: Multiple opinions indicate a strong bullish sentiment for BTC. Comments mention large investments to pump BTC, expectations of breaking all-time highs, and negative funding rates suggesting the majority are short, which can fuel a short squeeze upwards. Several participants state 'only up', 'no way we crash', and intentions to add to long positions, supported by technical observations such as EMAs curling up and price holding support.
representative_opinions: LORD UZI: millions of dollars have been invested into the market to pump this time btc is going to break the all time high
Ruslanas Gu: no way we crash
Neev: agree ruslanas i might add to my long
